name: First Sunday Bird Walk
description:
Where: Saul Kere
Meeting time: 7 am
(walk ends by 9.30 am)
Meeting point:

https://maps.app.goo.gl/HmnUzgALVGQVFiS2A(access through RMZ Ecoworld/Adarsh Palm Retreat road)
Nearest Bus Stop: Intel stop on Ring Road, 2 Km/20 mins walk to the lake. Buses plying from Banashankari towards Marathahalli and other routes stop here.

Wear: Dull-coloured clothes, hats/caps, comfortable walking shoes, rain gear if there is rain forecast.
Bring: Notebook and a pen/pencil, and water.

Optional: Bird books/apps, binoculars, cameras, and any snacks you may need.

Post outing restaurant, with parking available, The Rasaganga, https://goo.gl/maps/1qhhakN1Srm8ADQg6
We look forward to meeting you on Sunday.
Bngbirds volunteers

name: Second Sunday Bird Walk
description:
Where: Lalbagh Botanical Gardens
Meeting time: 7:30 am (walk ends by 10 am)
Meeting point:
 https://maps.app.goo.gl/uCnGJ8wyKTdvHVyM9(Fountain inside West Gate, the gate next to Lalbagh Metro Station)
Nearest Public Transport: Lalbagh West Gate, Metro and Buses stop here.

Wear: Dull-coloured clothes, hats/caps, comfortable walking shoes, rain gear if there is rain forecast.
Bring: Notebook and a pen/pencil, and water.

Optional: Bird books/apps, binoculars that you may need.
Note: Cameras and food are not allowed inside the park.

Post outing restaurant, with parking available, Kamat West Gate, location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/nn2H9GpGDtTh92XVA
We look forward to meeting you on Sunday.
Bngbirds volunteers

name: Third Sunday Bird Walk
description:
WhereHesaraghatta Grasslands, we meet at the Animal Quarantine And Certification Services Hessarghatta Office and proceed from there towards ‘Rassba Farm’, where we will park our vehicles and use their facilities. We cross over to the grasslands from there to start the walk.   Nearest Bus Stop: CFSP Farm Stop, 2.6 Km/30 mins walk to the animal quarantine center office. Buses plying from Yelahanka towards Byatha stop here.    MapWe meet at https://maps.app.goo.gl/hS7DyGVL2FMJcnGh7 (please follow Google Maps to this place, to avoid muddy roads as much as possible) and proceed towards https://maps.app.goo.gl/5oUqJRzyANaJ735J7.   Wear: Dull-coloured clothes, hats/caps, comfortable walking shoes, rain gear if there is rain forecast.   Bring: Notebook and a pen/pencil, and water.   Optional: Bird books/apps, binoculars, cameras, and any snacks you may need.
   Post outing, one can opt for breakfast at Rassba Farms by ordering on the spot.   We look forward to meeting you on Sunday.   Bngbirds volunteers

location.name: Rassba Farm, Animal Quarantine and Certification Services

name: Fourth Sunday Bird Walk
description:
Where: Valley School
Meeting time: 6:30 am (walk ends by 9:30 am)   Registration is needed to participate in this walk, registrations open on the 3rd Sunday Night at 8 pm on this site and runs out very soon. Maximum 30 registrations allowed. Registrations form will open for registrations below

name: Fifth Sunday Bird Walk
description:
Where: Jakkur Lake
Meeting time: 7 am (walk ends by 9:30 am)   Meeting point: https://maps.google.com/?cid=1444929533645339597&entry=gps (Main Gate)   Nearest Public Transport: Catch the Airport bus, KIA-9, from ‘Majestic’ to ‘Kogilu Cross’. Take an auto from there for the last 3 km to the lake, or take 283B to Raitarasanthe Yelahanka and choose to walk/catch an auto from there for the last 2
km.   Wear: Dull-coloured clothes, hats/caps, comfortable walking shoes, rain gear if there is rain forecast.   Bring: Notebook, pen/pencil and water.   Optional: Bird books/apps, binoculars, cameras, and snacks that you may need.   Post-outing breakfast restaurant (with parking available):New Krishna Sagar Food Court location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/onMmdCgWzKfz9n9C8   We look forward to meeting you on Sunday!   Bngbirds volunteers
